name: An Interview With A Partypooper
description:
This is an interview with a partypooper.

Interview a partypooper using your actual microphone, the game uses voice recognition technology to recognize your voice.

The objective of the game is to ask the partypooper every question that you have perpared for him, alhtough look out since partygoers are still on a hunt for you.

WARNING! This game contains jumpscares and also uses your microphone.

DEMO BUILD DOES NOT CONTAIN ANY ANIMATIONS FOR THE PARTYPOOPER IM STILL WORKING ON THEM ALSO SOME STUFF IS BROKEN AS EXPECTED.

Please read the tutorial.
